raw_mentions: All of the known angiopoietins bind primarily to Tie2, and both Ang-1 and -2 bind to Tie2 with an affinity of 3 nM (Kd).

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Binding was measured in HBS buffer (HBS-P (10 mM HEPES, 150 mM NaCl, 0.05% Tween® 20, ph 7.4), 25° C. Purified ANG-2-His (R&D systems or in house purified) was added in various concentrations between 0.41 nM and 200 nM in solution.
A KD value was estimated using a 1:1 Langmuir binding model.

Here are the extracted sentences/rows that meet the criteria:


Ang2i-LC06 showed an EC50 concentration of >8000 ng/mL for binding to hANG-1 and 84 ng/mL for binding to hANG-2.
Ang2i-LC07 showed an EC50 concentration of >8000 ng/mL for binding to hANG-1 and 3006 ng/mL for binding to hANG-2.
Ang2k-LC08 showed an EC50 concentration of 8044 ng/mL for binding to hANG-1 and 105 ng/mL for binding to hANG-2.
MAb536 showed an EC50 concentration of 2538 ng/mL for binding to hANG-1 and 133 ng/mL for binding to hANG-2.
Ang2i-LC06 had a KD of 117.16 pM and a kdt(1/2) diss of 1611 min for binding to hANG-2.
Ang2k-LC08 had a KD of 161.61 pM and a kdt(1/2) diss of 7227 min for binding to hANG-2.
MAb536 had a KD of 291.44 pM and a kdt(1/2) diss of 8029 min for binding to hANG-2.
Ang2i-LC06 had an IC50 value of >100 nM for inhibiting ANGPT1/Tie2 interaction and 0.1 nM for inhibiting ANGPT2/Tie2 interaction.
Ang2k-LC08 had an IC50 value of 11 nM for inhibiting ANGPT1/Tie2 interaction and 0.17 nM for inhibiting ANGPT2/Tie2 interaction.
MAb536 had an IC50 value of n.d. for inhibiting ANGPT1/Tie2 interaction and 0.15 nM for inhibiting ANGPT2/Tie2 interaction.
Ang2i-LC06 interfered with ANGPT2 stimulated Tie2 phosphorylation with an IC50 value of approx. 508 ng/ml.
Ang2k-LC08 interfered with ANGPT2 stimulated Tie2 phosphorylation with an IC50 value of approx. 499 ng/ml.
Ang2k-LC08 interfered with ANGPT1 stimulated Tie2 phosphorylation with an IC50 value of approx. 391 ng/ml.
